issue.title: [CF 380] enemy Pet cooldown!?
issue.body:
Hi, is it possible to show enemy pet cooldowns if i have the petowner in my target?


> Posted by CurseForge user shinx | Imported from CurseForge issue #380 | Raw

comments.body:
Pets can be accessed by appending pet to the unitID. For example, the unitID of your target's pet is targetpet. The unitID of the first party member's pet is party1pet.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

thx now it works :)


> Posted by CurseForge user shinx
